## Checklist

- [ ] `bun run validate` passes locally

### If marketplace.json changed:
- [ ] Marketplace version bumped (see versioning policy)
- [ ] CHANGELOG.md updated

### If adding/updating a plugin:
- [ ] Plugin version bumped in `.claude-plugin/plugin.json` (if updating existing)
- [ ] README exists with minimum viable content
- [ ] `claude plugin validate .` passes from plugin directory
